messages.name: Lucky Rabbit
messages.message: Looks like you're lucky today. You've found one of the secret entrances to Luckyland.
messages.advise: Can you catch a lucky gem to enter?

messages.name: Lucky Rabbit
messages.message: Catch a lucky gem and you can enter!
messages.advise: But be careful! You only have 3 attempts.

messages.name: Lucky Rabbit
messages.message: You seem persistent. Let's try again!

messages.name: Lucky Rabbit
messages.advise: Remember you only have 3 attempts. Good luck!

messages.name: Lucky Rabbit
messages.message: I think you already know how it works. Let's try again!
